title: Google's John Mueller: Move JavaScript Below The Head Element
excerpt: John Mueller from Google advises placing JavaScript code underneath the HTML element to ensure that search engines can clearly understand your website.

title: Vue.js And SEO: How To Optimize Reactive Websites For Search Engines And Bots — Smashing Magazine
excerpt: Do websites created with reactive frameworks get indexed by Google and other search engines? Is it compulsory to set up pre-rendering, as your SEO consultants suggest? Or are they wrong? In this article, Paolo Mioni will talk mostly about Vue.js, since it is the framework he’s used most, and with which he has direct experiences in terms of indexing by the search engines on major projects, but most of what will be covered is valid for other frameworks, too.
